RESOURCE.NAME: Russian MorphTagger
RESOURCE.COMMENT: MorphTagger for russian language, based on MyStem Yandex' parser

PARAMETER.NAME: nativeFolder
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Path to the folder, where native mystem components are located (native/ folder inside work dir by default)

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input document encoding for MyStem (UTF-8 by default)
